param.name: password
param.label: Password for notebook session:
param.help: Enter password or leave blank for no password

param.name: path_to_sing
param.label: Path to singularity container
param.help: Path to the singularity container in the execution host

param.name: use_gpus
param.label: Use GPUs?
param.help: Select Yes to run a CUDA application inside a container

param.name: jobschedulertype
param.label: Select Controller, SLURM Partition or PBS Queue
param.help: Job will submitted using SSH, sbatch or qsub, respectively

param.name: _sch__dd_partition_e_
param.label: SLURM partition
param.help: Partition to submit the interactive job. Leave empty to let SLURM pick the optimal option.

param.name: _sch__dd_time_e_
param.label: Walltime
param.help: e.g. 01:00:00 - Amount of time slurm will honor the interactive session.

param.name: scheduler_directives
param.label: Scheduler directives
param.help: e.g. --mem=1000;--gpus-per-node=1 - Use the semicolon character ; to separate parameters. Do not include the SBATCH keyword.
